verses: O God, thou hast cast us off, thou hast
us, thou hast been displeased; O turn thyself to us again.
Thou hast made the earth to tremble; thou hast broken it: heal the breaches thereof; for it shaketh.
Thou hast shewed thy people hard things: thou hast made us to drink the wine of
to them that fear thee, that it may be displayed because of the truth.
thy right hand, and hear me.
God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of
the strength of mine head; Judah
will I cast out my shoe:
OR over Philistia will I triumph. See
the strong city? who will lead me into Edom?
didst not go out with our armies?
Give us help from trouble: for vain
Through God we shall do valiantly: for he
